description: Perhaps, Pakistan felt it had returned to its older role of indispensable intermediary as New Delhi remained the insouciant child who refused to bow to Trump’s diktats. Overnight, the illusion shattered as Trump announced the US had reached a trade agreement with India lowering tariffs on India’s exports to 18%. While most of the details about the deal are still being worked out, that didn’t stop a full-blown meltdown on Pakistani (or South Asian) Twitter.

This proactive approach, exemplified by deals with the US, EU, UK, and Gulf nations, cushioned the impact of punitive tariffs and repositioned the nation as a resilient player in global supply chains, emphasizing leverage over confrontation.

Police have registered a negligence case against the shop owner for failing to provide safety instructions to his employee, who also suffered injuries.

description: Your car's suspension signals its decline through subtle changes. Listen for harsher rides over bumps, excessive bouncing, and strange noises. Address them promptly.

Early Signs Of Oral Cancer: Oncologist urges attention to persistent mouth sores
description: Oral cancer often goes unnoticed due to subtle early symptoms and societal stigma around related habits.  Dr. Vijay Haribhakti highlights that persistent mouth sores, white or red patches, and lumps, especially those lasting over two weeks, require urgent medical attention. Early detection through vigilance and regular check-ups is crucial for successful treatment.

title: Explained: What is Anthropic's AI tool that wiped $285 billion off software stocks in a single day
description: A swift market reaction, dubbed 'SaaSpocalypse,' saw software stocks plummet by $285 billion after Anthropic's AI assistant, Claude Cowork, launched new plugins.  The legal workflow automation plugin, in particular, triggered a selloff in legal tech and broader software sectors. Analysts now fear AI platforms are becoming direct competitors to existing software providers.

title: Willow by Cricbuzz to stream Team USA T20 World Cup 2026 matches free on YouTube
description: Willow by Cricbuzz has announced major updates for the 2026 season, including free streaming of all four Team USA matches at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup on YouTube for the first time. The platform has also partnered with Jomboy Media for creator-led alternate telecasts and unveiled a revamped, faster viewing experience across its apps and devices.

title: 2026 NASCAR Cup Series: how to watch the rescheduled Cook Out Clash
description: Get ready for the 2026 NASCAR Cup season opener, the Cook Out Clash! This exciting exhibition race at Bowman Gray Stadium on Fox Sports, starting at 6 p.m. ET, lets drivers test new cars and strategies. While it doesn't award points, it's crucial for teams to analyze rules and car performance before the main event.
